long_description: Offering dependable 3-season backpacking and car-camping performance at a wallet-pleasing value, The North Face Talus 4 Tent shelters 4 people in light, durable and convenient comfort. Fully seam-sealed canopy and floor help keep you snug and dry; high/low ventilation promotes breathability and helps control condensation. 2 doors make it easy to get in and out of the tent; 2 vestibules store gear and help keep the doors dry. DAC Featherlite(R) NSL pole ends feature unique inserts that create strong, functional poles to save weight and reduce breakage. DAC poles use an anodization process that eliminates harsh acids. Poles and rainfly can be set up with the included ground tarp to create an even lighter weight shelter. The North Face Talus 4 Tent comes with a gear loft, ground tarp, guylines, stakes and stuff sacks.
short_description: Offering dependable 3-season backpacking and car-camping performance at a wallet-pleasing value, The North Face Talus 4 Tent shelters 4 people in light, durable and convenient comfort.
